Text: While it's downloading, I might want to add to you that Railworks 3 has its own defense system. After unzipping and installing the last torrent for it I got a popup saying, "Log in to Steam" but of course I don't own it on Steam, the fix that came with it didn't work. I hope this one's different. I'll report some feedback once I get it going.

People, do not download. This is a waste of time, not enough seeders. My download has stopped at 78%, since nobody will get to 100% in the near future I will stop seeding. Sorry, but I don't want to get caught for no good. (It's the seeding that gets ya)

This works perfectly for me, thanks!

Must ask though, there is quite a size difference between this and the SKIDROW version.

Is anything missing?

Thanks
